name: Mahjong Alchemy
description: Collect the same cards by simply selecting them on the screen! Train your memory and improve your attentiveness to find pairs even faster! Remember, the faster you open a pair, the more points you will get! At the same time, enjoy the atmosphere of a Chinese festival and the magic of alchemy on the road or after a hard day's work! The game is perfect for relaxing and getting only positive emotions! Also, do not forget to buy new cards! The more beautiful and rare the card, the more expensive it is, but believe me, it's worth it!
